info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Rust-Off™ is a lead and chromate free metal primer with outstanding rust-inhibiting properties especially made for interior and exterior steel and iron surfaces.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: Rust-inhibitive primer or intermediate coat for the maintenance of interior and exterior architectural metal or structural steel such as doors, beams, framings, and railings.

info.title: FEATURES
info.subtitle: Environment-friendly
info.body: It is formulated without lead or chromates.

info.title: FEATURES
info.subtitle: Superb Corrosion Resistance
info.body: It is developed with special rust-inhibiting pigments that are even more corrosion-resistant than traditional lead and chromate pigments.

info.title: FEATURES
info.subtitle: Excellent Hiding Quality
info.body: Its light gray shade offers optimal cover for white and other colored topcoats.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body: Wipe the surface with a rag soaked in paint thinner to remove grease, oil, wax and other foreign matter. For recoating pre-painted galvanized surfaces in good condition, sand lightly then wipe the surface with a clean rag before applying paint. Remove all loose paint film to sound surface. For corroded galvanized surfaces, remove rust by wire brushing and use BOYSEN®® Metal Etching Solution B‑71. Let it stay for 10-15 minutes. Be sure to remove all remaining residue. Immediately prime after drying.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: New Painting
info.body: Primer: BOYSEN®® Rust-Off™ Gray Alkyd Metal Primer B‑330 2nd & 3rd coat: BOYSEN®® Roofgard™ , BOYSEN®® Cool Shades™ , BOYSEN®® Acqua Epoxy™ , BOYSEN®® Quick Drying Enamel
